featured.text: By sharing knowledge and information, the different sectors are able to come up with improved processing and handling, through which creation of various innovative products was made possible.

definition.zh_def: 一個特定的區域或領域，通常用於經濟、社會或技術的分類。
definition.en_def: A distinct part or division of a larger area, often used in economic, social, or technical contexts.
definition.example: The technology sector is rapidly growing and creating new job opportunities.
